00063 void Table::initialize(const String &name) {
00064   String tablefile = "/hypertable/tables/"; tablefile += name;
00065   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00066   uint64_t handle;
00067   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00068   String errmsg;
00069 
00070   // TODO: issue 11
00074   try {
00075     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00076   }
00077   catch (Exception &e) {
00078     if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00079       HT_THROW2(Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST, e, "");
00080     HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e,
00081                "Unable to open Hyperspace table file '%s'", tablefile.c_str());
00082   }
00083 
00084   {
00085     char *table_name = new char [strlen(name.c_str()) + 1];
00086     strcpy(table_name, name.c_str());
00087     m_table.name = table_name;
00088   }
00089 
00093   value_buf.clear();
00094   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00095 
00096   assert(value_buf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00097 
00098   // TODO: fix me!
00099   memcpy(&m_table.id, value_buf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00100 
00104   value_buf.clear();
00105   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", value_buf);
00106 
00107   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00108 
00109   m_schema_ptr = Schema::new_instance((const char *)value_buf.base, strlen((const char *)value_buf.base), true);
00110 
00111   if (!m_schema_ptr->is_valid()) {
00112     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error: %s", m_schema_ptr->get_error_string());
00113     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, "");
00114   }
00115 
00116   m_table.generation = m_schema_ptr->get_generation();
00117 
00118 }

00126 TableMutator *Table::create_mutator(int timeout) {
00127   return new TableMutator(m_props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr, timeout);
